text: The Deputy Clerk of the House of Commons acts as assistant to the Clerk in the administration of the House of Commons of Canada. The post was created in 1987 and is currently held by Marc Bosc. ==List of Deputy Clerks== * Marc Bosc, 2005–present * Audrey O'Brien, 2000–2005 * William C. Corbett, 1999–1999 * Camille Montpetit, 1998–1999 * Mary Anne Griffith, 1987–1997 == References == * Officers and Officials of Parliament of Canada Deputy Clerks Category:Canadian civil servants Category:House of Commons of Canada Category:Ceremonial officers in Canada Category:Clerks of the House of Commons (Canada)
title: Deputy Clerk of the House of Commons
